meanings.definition: A vacation spent in one's home country rather than abroad.
meanings.sent1: Many families enjoy staycations during the summer to explore local attractions.
meanings.sent2: Staycations have become popular due to their cost-effectiveness and convenience.
meanings.sent3: For their staycation, the family transformed their backyard into a mini paradise.
meanings.sent4: The concept of staycations opens up a world of new experiences within familiar surroundings.
meanings.sent5: Staycations allow people to appreciate the beauty of their own country.

meanings.definition: The act of staying in one's own home for a vacation.
meanings.sent1: During the pandemic, many opted for staycations to relax without traveling.
meanings.sent2: Staycations can be a great way to unwind without the stress of packing and airports.
meanings.sent3: Their staycation involved movie marathons and homemade spa treatments.
meanings.sent4: In a staycation, the living room transforms into a cozy retreat from daily life.
meanings.sent5: Staycations offer a chance to recharge in the comfort of your own space.
